results.title: Metformin decreased myocardial fibrosis and apoptosis in hyperhomocysteinemia -induced cardiac hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: However, whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protects against @DISEASE_Hyperhomocysteinemia @DISEASE_MESH:D020138 @@@HHcy@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ is unclear.

results.text_hl: Together with adequate energy stress, this was one of the possible triggers of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@mitochondrial enlargement@@@.

results.title: Metformin attenuates angiotensin II-induced cardiomyocyte hypertrophy by upregulating the MuRF1 and MAFbx pathway
results.text_hl: Taken together, data from the present study suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can prevent @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ through the @GENE_TRIM63 @GENE_140939 @@@MuRF1@@@ and @GENE_FBXO32 @GENE_171043 @@@MAFbx@@@ pathways.

results.title: Cardiovascular outcome in 12-month-old male and female offspring of metformin-treated obese mice.
results.text_hl: Male @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-exposed offspring also showed @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiomegaly@@@, increased cardiac collagen and vascular sympathetic hyperreactivity, suggesting @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exposure worsened the cardiovascular phenotype.

results.title: Metformin Reduces the Progression of Atherogenesis by Regulating the Sestrin2-mTOR Pathway in Obese and Diabetic Rats
results.text_hl: However, the role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in regulating the Sestrin-@GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@ nexus via the @GENE_PRKAA1 @GENE_5562 @@@AMPK@@@ pathway, particularly in relation to the progression of @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@, remains unclear.

results.title: Metformin modulates microbiota and improves blood pressure and cardiac remodeling in a rat model of hypertension.
results.text_hl: It significantly reduced systolic and diastolic blood @DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ and improved cardiac function, as measured by end-diastolic volume, E/A, and @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ volume despite increased @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ reduced @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@cardiac inflammation@@@ by lowering macrophage infiltration and shifting macrophage subpopulations towards a less @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ phenotype.

results.title: [The 495th case: young female-hyperandrogenemia-severe insulin resistance].
results.text_hl: A 22-year-old female has complained of @DISEASE_Hirsutism @DISEASE_MESH:D006628 @@@hirsutism@@@, @DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@acanthosis nigricans@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@enlarged clitoris@@@, and @DISEASE_Dysmenorrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D004412 @@@menstrual disorders@@@ since puberty.
